ABOUTPORTFOLIOCONTACT

What does he do?

Frequently presses keys together into a machine.

Originally started making things using MEAN.

Found Angular too broad in its Version 1.

Stuck with React because its way more fun.

Had a JavaScript crisis, tried out Ruby.

Yeah, its whitespace. Its kind of groovey.

ES6 got wide spread adoption.

Made life a whole lot easier.

Now here I am, with not the worst option.

Whatever, I'll just gloat it makes prototyping easier.
